meanings.definition: A person who owns a home.
meanings.sent1: Many homeowners take pride in maintaining their properties.
meanings.sent2: The homeowners on our street are friendly and welcoming.
meanings.sent3: The homeowners decided to have a neighborhood barbecue to get to know each other better.
meanings.sent4: In the kingdom of houses, the homeowners are the rulers of their domains.
meanings.sent5: The homeowners' association ensures that all homeowners follow the community rules.

meanings.definition: The possessive form of the word 'homeowner'.
meanings.sent1: The homeowners' responsibility is to keep their homes in good condition.
meanings.sent2: I borrowed a lawnmower from the homeowners' shed.
meanings.sent3: The homeowners' cat loves to explore the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The homeowners' association meeting discussed upcoming maintenance projects.
meanings.sent5: The homeowners' insurance policy covered the damage from the storm.
